# Welcome {.unnumbered}


This project presents a stratification algorithm applied to aerial 3D point clouds. From a forest point cloud, it detects canopy layers based on local point density profiles.

It is a replication of the algorithm presented in:

> **Hamraz et al. (2017)**  
> *[Vertical stratification of forest canopy for segmentation of understory trees within small-footprint airborne LiDAR point clouds](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0924271617302708){target="_blank"}*.    
> ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, 130, pp. 385â€“392.

This project was published as an **M.Sc. Thesis** by **Kehlert (2024)**,, accessible via:
